Note: For another version in the same sermon, see 3322; cf. 6706.
Subjects: proverbs; men, worthy types of; sermons, verse in
_description: Four types of honourable men, in a Latin sermon, De corpore Cristi — two couplets

                    in fytyng& prelatȝ þat hauen gret kepyng
